result.title: Is printf faster than cout in C++ or not?
result.content:
Please have a look at these two solutions, the code using cout is accepted but the code using printf is giving TLE. I always thought printf is faster than than cout. What do you think?

http://codeforces.com/contest/436/submission/6890501

http://codeforces.com/contest/436/submission/6890486
